title: Customer Service Representive
job_overview:
We’re looking for a skilled Customer Support Representative with experience in Shopify and fashion e-commerce/dropshipping to join our team.

This role starts part-time but is intended to grow into a full-time, long-term position. We're looking for someone reliable, fast, and eager to grow with a close, supportive team.

Requirements:
Minimum 2 years experience in customer service for Shopify stores

Familiarity with fashion e-commerce or dropshipping is a must

Comfortable using Google Sheets and basic documentation tools

Excellent written and verbal communication in English

Fast learner and efficient in handling systems and communication

Strong attention to detail and able to work independently

Stable internet connection (having backup for power/internet is a big plus)

Looking for a long-term opportunity and team culture fit

Responsibilities:
Respond promptly and professionally to customer emails and support tickets

Handle returns, refunds, shipping/tracking concerns, and complaints

Keep Google Sheets updated with accurate customer and order information

Communicate with suppliers when needed

Spot trends in customer issues and help suggest improvements

Keep the internal team informed with regular updates

What We Offer:
Part-time start, with the opportunity to grow into full-time

A stable, long-term remote role

Weekly payments

A collaborative, encouraging, and high-performance work environment

Real opportunities for growth and advancement

A tight-knit team where your input truly matters

To Apply, Please Send:
A short introduction about yourself

Your resume

A short 1–2 minute video explaining your relevant experience

A screenshot of your internet speed test from speedtest.net

Your current location and if you have internet/power backup

Important: Only apply if you have direct, hands-on experience with Shopify and Google Sheets in a real e-commerce environment. Applications without these qualifications will not be considered.

We’re excited to find someone who’s ready to start part-time, grow into full-time, and become a valuable part of our team for the long term.
